instruction.fr: Associez les moyens de transport aux situations
instruction.ty: E fa'ari'i te mau huru fa'arerere'a e te mau ravea

text.fr: Le voyage en Polynésie française a une riche tradition maritime. Les va'a (pirogues) étaient les premiers moyens de transport entre les îles. Aujourd'hui, les ferries modernes et les avions connectent les îles, mais la navigation traditionnelle reste importante pour la culture et les festivals comme la Hawaiki Nui Va'a.
text.ty: Te tere i Porinētia farāni e mea rahi tona haapiira'a moana. Te mau va'a, o te mau fa'arerere'a mua roa ia i rotopū i te mau motu. I teie nei, te mau pahi ma te mau pereoo e fa'ari'i nei i te mau motu, e te fa'arerere'a tupuna e mea rahi tonu no te haapiira'a ma te mau tamaraa e pehe ai te Hawaiki Nui Va'a.
text.en: Travel in French Polynesia has a rich maritime tradition. Va'a (canoes) were the first means of transportation between islands. Today, modern ferries and planes connect the islands, but traditional navigation remains important for culture and festivals like the Hawaiki Nui Va'a.

summary.fr: Vous pouvez maintenant parler de transport et de voyage en tahitien. Ce vocabulaire vous aidera à naviguer en Polynésie française.
summary.ty: E nehenehe teie nei ia 'oe e parau i te fa'arerere'a ma te tere tahiti. Teie mau 'upu e 'oa ia 'oe e tere ai i Porinētia farāni.
summary.en: You can now talk about transportation and travel in Tahitian. This vocabulary will help you navigate French Polynesia.

keyPoints: Va'a (canoes) are central to Polynesian culture
Traditional navigation skills are still valued
